Package net.minecraft.client.gui.screen.ingame

Class ContainerScreen<T extends Container>

java.lang.Object
net.minecraft.client.gui.DrawableHelper
net.minecraft.client.gui.AbstractParentElement
net.minecraft.client.gui.screen.Screen
net.minecraft.client.gui.screen.ingame.ContainerScreen<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable, Element, ParentElement, ContainerProvider<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractFurnaceScreen, AbstractInventoryScreen, AnvilScreen, BeaconScreen, BrewingStandScreen, CartographyTableScreen, CraftingTableScreen, EnchantingScreen, Generic3x3ContainerScreen, GenericContainerScreen, GrindstoneScreen, HopperScreen, HorseScreen, LoomScreen, MerchantScreen, ShulkerBoxScreen, StonecutterScreen
@Environment(CLIENT)
public abstract class ContainerScreen<T extends Container>
extends Screen
implements ContainerProvider<T>
